name: Haven (itch) (DuckDuckGrem)
description:
"You life was never really your own -- not even on your wedding day. So you packed a bag, emptied your bank account, and hopped on a bus to the small town of Haven, hoping to leave everything holding you back behind. But now you're here, and the reality of running away seems to be chasing after you. Amongst other things."

--- ___ Welcome to Haven ___ ---

Haven is a light horror dating sim that follows the journey of the main character (who you get to name & choose pronouns for) as they attempt to start a new life away from their abusive and oppressive family, partner, and past. Your choices will determine whether or not they succeed, and if so, what exactly that looks like. 

As such, we would like to give content warnings for the following:

 * Abuse from parents / family

 * Abuse from a romantic partner

 * Emotional & financial manipulation & control 

This version of Haven is a demo originally created for the interact-if text-based story jam 2022 (ranked) game jam. We intend to continue writing & developing the game once the jam is over, so we hope you'll follow along to see the final version.

Enjoy!

Credits:

- Written by Victor T Damnrose

- Programmed by Grem
